item.title: New York State Officials Approve Proposal for Controversial Underwater Gas Pipeline
item.description: The contentious proposal, previously rebuffed by state regulators who expressed environmental concerns, was deemed acceptable on Friday.

item.title: Nancy Pelosi’s Legacy as a Powerful Speaker in a Fractious House
item.description: The first female speaker of the House may be the last to truly rule the increasingly unruly chamber.
